data.text: Dawuda dii xɛmɛn Sulemani a sandane, Isirayila Mangana.
Sandani itoe sɛbɛxi nɛn
alogo e xa xuru, e xaxili sɔtɔ
fe kolontarene yi e ɲɔxɔ lu,
Fe kolonne xa itoe ramɛ,
alogo e xa sandane nun taline bunna kolon
Xaxilimayaan fɔlɔma Alatala yɛɛragaxun nan ma.
N ma diina,
E luxi nɛn
N ma diina,
Xa e a fala i xa,
en yi e ɲɛɲɛne ralɔ ayi
En se faɲi kɛndɛn sifan birin sɔtɔma nɛn
Nxu na seene yitaxun,
N ma diina,
E gima siga fe ɲaxin nabadeni,
Naxan na lutin nati xɔline yɛɛ ra
Muxu sifani ito lutin natima e yɛtɛ nan yɛɛ ra,
Awa, naxanye kunfama se muɲaxine xɔn,
Xaxilimayaan1.20 xaxilimayana: Sandani ito kui, xaxilimayaan bata findi muxun na naxan adamadiine kawandima alogo e xa fe kolonna sɔtɔ. falan tima kirane xɔn,
a sɔnxɔma kira xunne ma
A naxa, “Ɛ tan fe kolontarene,
N na ɛ sɔnna fala,
Koni bayo n bata ɛ xili,
ɛ yi ɛ mɛ n ma maxadi xuine birin na
nayi, gbalon na ɛ sɔtɔ,
Fe magaxuxin fama ɛ ma nɛn
“Na waxatini,
Amasɔtɔ ɛ bata kolonna raɲaxu,
bayo ɛ mi tin n ma maxadi xuine ramɛ,
Ɛ sigati kiin saranna sɔtɔma nɛn,
Amasɔtɔ fe kolontarene faxama nɛn e dina suxutareyani,
Koni naxan na a tuli mati n na,
